body: This function will silently always return False if you pass it a tensor rather than a tensor type, and this is especially pernicious because the type of this function changed, so it's bad juju if you forgot to update a call-site. Maybe it should check `isinstance(t, type)` and raise an error if this is not the case?
body_html: This function will silently always return False if you pass it a tensor rather than a tensor type, and this is especially pernicious because the type of this function changed, so it's bad juju if you forgot to update a call-site. Maybe it should check isinstance(t, type) and raise an error if this is not the case?
body_text: This function will silently always return False if you pass it a tensor rather than a tensor type, and this is especially pernicious because the type of this function changed, so it's bad juju if you forgot to update a call-site. Maybe it should check isinstance(t, type) and raise an error if this is not the case?
